SELECT a.id, a.desktop_name desktopName, a.desktop_name_cn desktopCnName, a.state, a.order_by orderBy, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_menu b WHERE b.desktop_id = a.id) allNum, CONCAT_WS('_', d.job_number, d.user_name) createName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, CONCAT_WS('_', e.job_number, e.user_name) lastUpdateName, CONVERT(a.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM sys_eve_desktop a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff d ON a.create_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff e ON a.last_update_id = e.user_id WHERE a.state != 0
AND a.desktop_name LIKE '%${desktopName}%'
ORDER BY a.order_by DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT into sys_eve_desktop (id, desktop_name, desktop_name_cn, order_by, state, create_id, create_time, last_update_id, last_update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{desktopName}, #{desktopCnName}, #{orderBy}, #{state}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.state FROM sys_eve_desktop a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id, a.desktop_name desktopName, a.desktop_name_cn desktopCnName FROM sys_eve_desktop a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.order_by thisOrderBy, b.id, b.order_by prevOrderBy FROM sys_eve_desktop a, sys_eve_desktop b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND b.order_by > a.order_by AND b.state != 0 ORDER BY b.order_by ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.order_by thisOrderBy, b.id, b.order_by prevOrderBy FROM sys_eve_desktop a, sys_eve_desktop b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.order_by > b.order_by AND b.state != 0 ORDER BY b.order_by DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT a.id, CASE #{language} WHEN 'zh' THEN a.desktop_name WHEN 'cn' THEN a.desktop_name_cn ELSE '' END name FROM sys_eve_desktop a WHERE a.state != 0 ORDER BY a.order_by DESC
SELECT a.state, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_menu b WHERE b.desktop_id = a.id) allNum FROM sys_eve_desktop a WHERE a.id = #{id}
